name: PyJVM
tagline: Java Virtual Machine implemented in pure python
body:
* GPL
* Requires python 2.7
* https://github.com/andrewromanenco/pyjvm

## Documentation
* [How to start virtual machine](https://github.com/andrewromanenco/pyjvm/blob/master/START.md)
* [About virtual machine](https://github.com/andrewromanenco/pyjvm/blob/master/docs/vm.md)
* [Class resolution and loading](https://github.com/andrewromanenco/pyjvm/blob/master/docs/class_loading.md)
* [Multithreading](https://github.com/andrewromanenco/pyjvm/blob/master/docs/threads.md)
* [Native methods](https://github.com/andrewromanenco/pyjvm/blob/master/docs/natives.md)
* [More docs...](https://github.com/andrewromanenco/pyjvm/tree/master/docs)
